name: Swatter & Fly
description:
Cause chaos as a nimble fly, irritate the human and evade their attacks! Earn points for surviving and a bonus for hitting windows, but beware, hitting obstacles will reduce your speed and make you easier to hit.

Producer:
Stanley M

Programmers:
Zak C, Stanley M

Designers:
Dylan H, Marton

Artists:
Samuele A, Axada R

Sound designers:
Red, Toni D
